message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Quiet but constructive session for mid/small caps. Cyclicals/metals eased (SAIL, HindCopper), while exchanges/depositories stayed resilient (BSE dipped to support; CDSL held >1600). Cap goods/PSU had an inside-to-soft day (BHEL sub-287; BEL below 430 band). Pharma mixed: Laurus held ~980 but below add triggers; Biocon soft. High-volume interest in GMRAIRPORT coiling just under 105.5 breakout. Overall breadth neutral; several names coiling below clean triggers into next week.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "GMRAIRPORT", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "High volume coil; clean trigger above 105.5–106 could start next leg. Initial risk to ~99.5; prefer pullback retests if gap-up.", "price": 104.05},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "PSU/cap goods leader; momentum resumes on decisive push >287–292. Risk marker ~276–278.", "price": 282.5},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Add on breakout or controlled dip", "reason": "Theme strong; add through 2915–2960 or on dip/retest 2830–2860 with tight stop (~2790).", "price": 2858.3},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Buy on retest/strength", "reason": "Holding 1600. Prefer dip bids 1605–1615 or strength >1665–1670. Risk marker ~1580.", "price": 1610.2},
    {"symbol": "INDUSTOWER", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Coiling base; sustained move >415 with volume can start a fresh leg. Risk marker ~392.", "price": 397.0},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Momentum add on breakout", "reason": "Continuation trigger above 117.5; use ~111.5 stop on fresh entries.", "price": 112.61},
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Strength-only entry", "reason": "Supply at 430–432; cleaner momentum only on a high-volume push through that band. Risk marker ~404.", "price": 416.35},
    {"symbol": "IDBI", "signal": "Strength-only continuation", "reason": "PSU banks consolidating; continuation only on reclaim >105. Manage risk tight given recent run.", "price": 100.24},
    {"symbol": "RVNL", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Constructive base; early strength >319 with confirmation >328 opens next leg. Fresh risk ~311.", "price": 314.0},
    {"symbol": "LAURUSLABS", "signal": "Add on strength; otherwise hold back", "reason": "Leader in pharma but below add zone; prefer adds above 1005/1025. Trail risk reference ~965.", "price": 978.2}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "GMRAIRPORT", "action": "Buy", "reason": "If decisive breakout above resistance. Triggered entry keeps risk defined; SL ~99.50.", "quantity": 45, "price": "SL-L 105.60"},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Momentum entry only if it clears recent ceiling; SL ~276.", "quantity": 20, "price": "SL-L 287.20"},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Buy-the-dip near support zone; risk tight below ~2790.", "quantity": 2, "price": "L 2835.00"},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Retest of 1605–1615 zone with defined risk (~1580) offers favorable R:R.", "quantity": 3, "price": "L 1608.00"}
  ],
  "portfolio": {"cash": 27500.2, "total_value": 27500.2, "holdings_count": 0, "holdings": []},
  "screening_notes": [
    "Pharma: Laurus held ~980 but needs >1005/1025 for continuation; Biocon weak <405/423; Lupin steady near 2030.",
    "Exchanges/Depositories: BSE dipped to support; CDSL held >1600; MCX extended—prefer dips.",
    "PSU/Cap goods: BHEL below 287 trigger; BEL needs >430–432; ABB/THERMAX cooled; shipyards (GRSE) eased.",
    "Telecom towers: IndusTower basing below 415; Bharti Hexacom volatile—wait for decisive strength.",
    "Metals: SAIL weak at 134; HindCopper softer—prefer strength-only entries; avoid knife-catching.",
    "Infra/Rail PSU: RVNL constructive below 328; IRCON steady ~162–165; HUDCO holding ~230.",
    "Banks/NBFC: LTF slipped to 288.7 (below 291 line-in-sand)—wait for reclaim >301.5. PSU banks (IDBI/UCO/IOB/CENTRALBK) consolidating—avoid chasing.",
    "Renewables: InoxWind bounced but choppy; Waaree consolidating; KPIGREEN range—need breakouts.",
    "FMCG/Discretionary: Marico/Dabur stable; Voltas firm; Trent resilient but expensive—size carefully.",
    "Execution: For Monday, don’t chase >0.7% gap opens. Let first 20–30 mins set ranges; favor pullback entries to marked levels with tight stops and small sizes (max ~20–25% of portfolio per trade)."
  ]
}
